msg: Make String.format() calls, aside from those used in log statements, specify a Locale for consistent behavior.

author: davsclaus
msg: camel-gae: When creating Endpoint the CamelContext should be provided as its best practice. Fixed testing to use per test to avoid failed tests on other boxes due some weird side effects.
